Package neon.physics

Class CircularHitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • neon.physics.Hitbox
      • neon.physics.CircularHitbox
  • public class CircularHitbox
extends Hitbox
    A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of circular hitboxes.
